verses.name: Jeremiah 52:32
verses.text: And spake kindly unto him, and set his throne above the throne of the kings that were with him in Babylon,

verses.name: Jeremiah 52:33
verses.text: And changed his prison garments: and he did continually eat bread before him all the days of his life.

verses.name: Jeremiah 52:34
verses.text: And for his diet, there was a continual diet given him of the king of Babylon, every day a portion until the day of his death, all the days of his life.
